thread.title: Really Good Hotel
thread.title_full: Really Good Hotel - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Louise J
title: Really Good Hotel
text:
Hotel is ideally situated very close to Times Square. Room was a good size and very comfortable (although heating difficult to adjust). Breakfast was great - great selection, regularly replenished and breakfast room was really spacious with excellent views. Only slight drawback was the elevators (particularly in the mornings) which were very slow. Overall though a great hotel and facilitated an excellent trip in NYC.
Room Tip: Room on higher floor are quiet with great views See more room tips
